title: Understanding Schedule V
text: Schedule V drugs are considered to have a lower potential for abuse compared to other schedules. They often include medications with limited quantities of certain narcotics.

title: Characteristics of Schedule V
text: These substances are typically used for antidiarrheal, antitussive, and analgesic purposes. They contain limited quantities of certain narcotics.

hintAnswer: lower potential for abuse than Schedule IV and consists of preparations containing limited quantities of certain narcotics
title: Comparing Schedule IV and V
text: How does the potential for abuse in Schedule V compare to Schedule IV?
choices: moderate to low potential for physical and psychological dependence
low potential for abuse and low risk of dependence
lower potential for abuse than Schedule IV and consists of preparations containing limited quantities of certain narcotics
